<div id="container">
<div id="body_main">

<div id ="left_column">

<h2 class="page_heading">Dr. A. K. Sao</h2>

<div id="data_container">

<div id="data">

<div id="data_top">

<img src="images/anil.jpg" alt="Dr. A. K. Sao"/>



<div id="contact_info">

<table>

<tr>

<th>Phone : </th>   <td>01905-237918</td>

</tr>

<tr>

<th>EMail : </th>	<td>anil[at]iitmandi[dot]ac[dot]in</td>

</tr>

<tr>

<th>Address : </th>	<td>School of Computing and Electrical Engineering</td>

</tr>

<tr><th></th><td>IIT Mandi, PWD Rest House 2nd floor,</td></tr>

<tr><th></th><td>near Bus Stand, Mandi - 175001</td></tr>

<tr><th></th><td>India</td></tr>

</table>

</div>

</div>

<div id="data_bottom">

<div class="data_field">

<h3>Research interests</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Multimodal biometrics
</li><li>Face recognition</li>
<li>Image processing</li>
<li>Video processing</li>
<li>Computer vision and Pattern recognition
</li>
</ul></div>
</div>

<div class="data_field">

<h3>Education</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li> B.E (Electronics) from NIT, Raipur, Pt. Ravishankar Shukla Univ.-Raipur, Chattisgarah
         
</li>
<li>M.S in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Madras-Chennai, TN
</li>
<li>
Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from
Indian Institute of Technology Madras-Chennai, TN<br/>
Thesis title: Representation of edge-like information in images with application for face recognition
</li>
</ul></div>

</div>

<div class="data_field">

<h3>Professional Experience</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Indian Institute of Technology Madras-Chennai, TN<br/>
      Project Associate: Oct. 2003 - July 2004

</li><li> International Institute of Information Technology-Hyderabad, AP<br/>
   Senior Research Assistant: Aug. 2009 - Jun 2010
</li>
</ul></div>

</div>

<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Publication in Journals</h3>
<div class="data"><ul>

<li> Anil Kumar Sao and B. Yegnanarayana. Edge extraction using zero-frequency resonator.Signal, Image and Video Processing, Springer London,1863-1703, <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/s11760-011-0233-9">WWW</a> [note: 10.1007/s11760-011-0233-9].</li>
<li>A. K. Sao and B. Yegnanarayana, "On the use of Phase of the Fourier transform for face recognition under variations in illumination ", to be published Signal, Image and Video
Processing.
</li>
<li>A. K. Sao, B. Yegnanarayana and B. V. K. Vijay Kumar , "Significance of image
representation for face recognition", Signal, Image and Video Processing , vol. 1, pp.
225-237, 2007.
</li>
<li>A. K. Sao and B. Yegnanarayana, "Face verification using template matching", IEEE
Trans. Information Forensics and Security, vol. 2, No. 3, pp. 636-641, 2007.
</li>
</ul></div>

</div>


<div class="data_field large_df">

<h3>Publications in conferences</h3>

<div class="data">
<ul>
<li> Vinayak Abrol, Pulkit Sharma and Anil Kumar Sao.Speech Enhancement using Compressed Sensing. in 14th Annual Conference of the International Speech Communication Association (INTERSPEECH),   August, 2013.  </li>
<li> S. Mandal and Anil Kumar Sao. Edge preserving single image super resolution in sparse environment. in  20th IEEE International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP’13), pp. 967-971,  September, 2013.  </li>
<li>Shejin T and Anil Kumar Sao. Analysis of WD Face Dictionary for Sparse Coding Based Face Recognition.  in proceedings of  the 17thInternational Conference on Image Analysis and Processing (ICIAP 2013), pp. 221-230, September 9-13, 2013.  </li>
<li>Shejin T and Anil Kumar Sao. Significance of Dictionary for Sparse Coding Based Face Recognition. in proceedings of the 11th International Conference of the Biometrics Special Interest Group (IEEE BIOSIG 2012), pp. 245-256, 06.-07. September, 2011.</li>

<li>Anil Kumar Sao and B. Yegnanarayana. Laplacian of smoothed image as representation for face recognition. IEEE International Workshop on Information Forensics and Security (WIFS). doi: 10.1109/WIFS.2011.6123140, pp. 1-6, 29 2011-dec. 2 , 2011.</li>


<li>Anil Kumar Sao and B. Yegnanarayana. Laplacian of smoothed image as representation for face recognition. IEEE International Workshop on Information Forensics and Security (WIFS). doi: 10.1109/WIFS.2011.6123140, pp. 1-6, 29 2011-dec. 2 , 2011.</li>
<li>Anil Kumar Sao. Combining analytic phase and Fourier phase for face recognition. International Conference on Image Information Processing (ICIIP), doi: 10.1109/ICIIP.2011.6108963, pp. 1-4, 3-5 Nov.2011</li>

<li>A. K. Sao and B. Yegnanarayana, "Analytic phase-based representation for face
recognition", in Proc. International Conference on Advances in Pattern Recognition
(ICAPR 2009) , pp. 453-456, 2009, ISI Kolkata, India.
</li><li>A. K. Sao and B. Yegnanarayana, "Template matching approach for pose problem in
face verification", in Proc. International Workshop on Multimedia Content
Representation Classification and Security (MRCS), vol. 4105, pp. 191-198, 2006,
Istanbul, Turkey.
</li><li>B. Yegnanarayana, C. Chandra Sekhar, S. Palanivel, V. Suresh, A. K. Sao and
Dhananjaya N., "Issues in the Development of an Audio-Video based Person
Authentication System ", in New Advances in Multimedia Security, Biometrics,
Watermarking and Cultural Aspects, pp. 53-76, 2006, Logos. Verlag Berlin
</li><li>A. K. Sao, B. Yegnanarayana, M. Savvides and B. V. K. Vijaya Kumar ,"Determination of
Pose angle for face using Dynamic Space Warping (DSW) ," in Proc. IEEE Conference
on Information Technology: Coding and Computing, pp. 661-664, 2004, Las Vegas,
Nevada, USA.
</li><li>K. Venkataramani and A. K. Sao and B. Yegnanarayana and B. V. K. Vijaya Kumar, "
Face authentication using one-dimensional processing," in Proc. SPIE, Biometric
Technology for Human Identification, vol. 5404, pp. 76-86, 2004, Florida, USA.
</li><li>A. K. Sao and B. Yegnanarayana, "Face Verification Using Correlation Filters and
autoassociative Neural Networks," in Proc. International Conference on Intelligent
Sensors and Information Processing, pp. 364-367, 2004, Chennai, India.
 </li></ul>
</div>

</div>


<div class="data_field large_df">

<h3>Professional activities</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Reviewer of IEEE Trans. Information Forensics and Security.
</li><li>Reviewer of Journal of Circuits, Systems and Signal Processing.
</li><li>Reviewer of Journal of Zhejiang University Science.
</li><li>Reviewer of several national and international conferences in the areas of image processing and pattern recognition.
</li>
</ul></div>

</div>

<div class="data_field large_df">

<h3>Conferences/workshops attended</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>International Conference on Advances in Pattern Recognition (ICAPR 2009), Kolkata.
</li><li>INAE Workshop on Image and Speech Processing, Dec. 12, 2008, Hyderabad.

2006, Chennai.

<h2 class="page_heading">Dr. Samar Agnihotri  </h2>
<div id="data_container">
<div id="data">

<div id="data_bottom">
<div class="data_field">
<h3>For Prospective Students</h3>
<!-- <b>Prospective Undergrad Summer Interns:</b> During the coming summer, I am not offering any undergrad internships. Therefore, please do not contact me for this.
<br><br> -->
<b>Prospective Graduate Students:</b> I am always interested in working with motivated students who have strong mathematical reasoning skills and an interest in one or more of the following: information theory, wireless communications, optimization, computer networks, and algorithms. If interested, then contact me with your detailed CV and a write-up (no more than two pages) on a research problem/area of your interest, clearly mentioning why it is important, what work/results already exist, and how do you think you can contribute to it.
</div></div>
<div id="data_bottom">
<div class="data_field">
<h3>Research Areas</h3>
Information Theory, Wireless Communications, Optimization Theory, Computational and Communication Complexity
</div></div>
<div id="data_bottom">
<div class="data_field">
<h3>Research Interests</h3>
Relay networks, Analog network coding, Device-to-device communication, Communication architectures for smart-grids, Distributed compression and computation, Wireless sensor and ad-hoc networks
</div></div>
<div class="data_field">
<h3>Teaching</h3>
<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>EE304 - Communication Theory (Fall 2014, Fall 2013, Spring 2013)</li>

<li>IC260 - Signals and Systems (Spring 2014)</li>

<li>MA651 - Optimization Techniques (Spring 2014) - with <a href="http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~manoj/">Dr. Manoj Thakur</a></li>

<li>EE503 - Advanced Communication Theory (Fall 2013)</li>

<li>EE609 - Network Information Theory (Spring 2013)</li>

<li>EE605 - Information Theory (Fall 2012)</li>
</ul>
</div></div>
<div class="data_field">

<li>M.Sc. Physics, Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur, 1998</li>

<li>B.Sc.(Honors) Physics, University of Delhi, 1996</li>
</ul>
</div></div>

<li>S. Agnihotri, K. Aravindhan, H. S. Jamadagni, B. I. Pawate. A new technique for improving quality of speech in voice over IP using time-scale modification. International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing (ICASSP) 2002, Orlando, FL, May 2002.<br>

<h5>Journal publications</h5>
<ul>
<li>A. Bhavsar, G. Wu, J. Lian, and D. Shen. "Resolution enhancement of lung 4D-CT via group-sparsity", Medical Physics, Vol. 40, Issue 12, 2013.</li>

<li>A. Bhavsar and A. N. Rajagopalan. "Range map super-resolution inpainting and reconstruction from sparse data". Computer Vision and Image Understanding (CVIU), Vol. 116, Issue 4, pp. 572 - 591, 2012.</li>
<li>A. Bhavsar and A. N. Rajagopalan. "Towards unrestrained depth inference with coherent occlusion filling", International Journal of Computer Vision (IJCV), Vol. 97, Issue 2, pp. 167 - 190, 2012.</li>
<li>A. Bhavsar and A. N. Rajagopalan. "Resolution enhancement in multi-image stereo". IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (IEEE PAMI), Vol. 32, Issue 9, pp. 1721 - 1728, 2010.</li>

</div>

<h5>Conference publications</h5>

<li>S. Shete, A. Bhavsar, and A. K. Sao. "Enhancing shape from focus-measure-fusion and sparse representation". Indian Conference on Computer Vision, Graphics and Image Processing, (ICVGIP 2014), 2014 (accepted).</li>

<li>S. Mandal, A. Bhavsar, and A. K. Sao. "Hierarchical example-based range image super-resolution with edge preservation". International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP 2014), 2014.</li>
<li>K. Gupta, V. Gupta, A. K. Sao, A. Bhavsar, and A. D. Dileep. "Class-specific hierarchical classification of HEp-2 cell images: The case of two classes". Workshop on Pattern Recognition Techniques for Indirect Immunofluorescence Images (with ICPR 2014), 2014.</li>
<li>A. Bhavsar, G. Wu, and D. Shen. "Harnessing group-sparsity regularization for resolution enhancement of lung 4D-CT". International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention (MICCAI 2013), pp 139-146, 2013.</li>
<li>A. Bhavsar. "Weakly supervised efficient texture segmentation via graph-cuts". International Conference on Communication, VLSI and Signal Processing (ICCVSP 2013), 2013.</li>

<li>IEEE Indicon 2005 organized by IIT Madras, Chennai, India</li>

<h5>Papers published/accepted in refereed journals</h5>
<ul>
<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “GMM based intermediate matching kernel for classification of varying length patterns of long duration speech using support vector machines”, accepted for publication in <em>IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems</em>, November 2013.</li>
<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “Class-specific GMM based intermediate matching kernel for classification of varying length patterns of long duration speech using support vector machines”, <em>Speech Communication</em>, vol. 57, pp. 126-143, 2014, DOI:http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.specom.2013.09.010.</li>
<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “HMM based intermediate matching kernel for classification of sequential patterns of speech using support vector machines”, accepted for publication in <em>IEEE Transactions on Audio, Speech and Language Processing </em>, vol. 21, no. 12, pp. 2570-2582, December 2013, DOI:10.1109/TASL.2013.2279338.</li>

</ul>

<h5>Papers in edited volumes</h5>
<ul>
<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “Speaker recognition using intermediate matching kernel based support vector machines”, in <em>Forensics Speaker Recognition: Law Enforcement and Counter-Terrorism</em>, A. Neustein and H. Patil, Eds., pp. 389-424, 2011. </li>
<li>A. D. Dileep, Veena T. and C. Chandra Sekhar, “A review of kernel methods based approaches to classification and clustering of sequential patterns, Part I: Sequences of continuous feature vectors”, in <em>Pattern Discovery Using Sequence Data 2. Mining: Applications and Studies</em>, Pradeep Kumar, P. Radha Krishna and S. Bapi Raju, Eds. Hershey, PA, USA:IGI Global, pp. 24-50, 2011.</li>
<li>T. Veena, A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “A review of kernel methods based approaches to classification and clustering of sequential patterns, Part II: Sequences of discrete symbols”, in <em>Pattern Discovery Using Sequence Data Mining: Applications and Studies</em>, Pradeep Kumar, P. Radha Krishna and S. Bapi Raju, Eds. Hershey, PA, USA:IGI Global, pp. 51-71, 2011.</li>

</ul>

<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “Selection of non-uniformly spaced orientations for Gabor filters using multiple kernel learning,” In <em>Proceedings of IEEE International Workshop on Machine Learning for Signal Processing, (MLSP 2010)</em>, Kittila, Finland, August 2010, pp 415-420.</li>
<li>T. Veena, A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “Scene categorization using large margin Gaussian mixture models,” In <em>Proceedings of International Conference on Image Processing, Computer Vision, & Pattern Recognition, (IPCV 2010)</em>, Los Vegas, USA, July 2010, pp. 395-401.</li>

<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “Combining representation and feature selection using multiple kernel learning,” In <em>Proceedings of International Conference on Cognitive and Neural Systems, (ICCNS 2009)</em>, Boston, USA, May 2009. </li>
<li>S. Swapna, A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, Sri Kant and P. K. Saxena, “Block cipher identification using support vector classification and regression,”  In <em>Proceedings of Pre-ICM (International Convention on Mathematical Sciences)</em>, New Delhi, India, December 2008.</li>
<li>A. D. Dileep, S. Swapna, C. Chandra Sekhar, Sri Kant and P. K. Saxena, “Decryption of Feistel type block ciphers using hetero-association model,” In <em>Proceedings of National Conference on Communications, (NCC 2008)</em>, Mumbai, India, February 2008, pp. 74-78.</li>
<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, “Identification of block ciphers using support vector machines,” In <em>Proceedings of International Joint Conference on Neural Networks, (IJCNN 2006)</em>, Vancouver, BC, Canada, July 2006, pp. 2696-2701.</li>

<h3>Research interests</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li> Artificial intelligence and cognitive modeling (modeling human behavior in dynamic tasks through computer algorithms)</li>
<li> Human-Computer Interaction (the study of interaction between people and computers)</li>
<li> Environmental decision making (understanding human behavior in environmental problems)</li>
<li> Judgment and decision making (understanding human behavior in problems involving risk and uncertainty)</li>

In Poster presented at the 20th Behavior Representation in Modeling & Simulation (BRIMS) Conference. Sundance Resort, Utah, USA.</li>

Gonzalez, C., & <b>Dutt, V.</b> (2011). Instance-based Learning Tool: Making Instance-based Learning Theory Usable, Transparent, and Understandable. In Tutorial presented at the 20th Behavior Representation in Modeling & Simulation (BRIMS) Conference. Sundance Resort, Utah, USA.</li>
<li>
Cassenti, D. N., <b>Dutt, V.</b>, Gonzalez, C., Pomranky, R., & Hunn, B. (2011). Defining a Robotics Operator Manager’s Responsibilities Using ACT-R. In Paper presented at the 20th Behavior Representation in Modeling & Simulation (BRIMS) Conference. Sundance Resort, Utah, USA.</li>
<li>
Lejarraga, T., <b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2010). Instance-based Learning in Repeated Binary Choice. In Paper presented at the 31st Annual Conference of the Society for Judgment and Decision Making. St. Louis, MO, USA.</li>
<li>
Gonzalez, C. & <b>Dutt, V.</b> (2010). Instance-based Learning: Integrating Decisions from Experience in Sampling and Repeated Choice Paradigms. In Paper presented at 2010 Experience, heuristics, and choice: Prospects for bounded rationality workshop at Carnegie Mellon University. Pittsburgh, PA, USA. </li>
<li>
Arlo-Costa, H., Gonzalez, C., <b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Helzner, J. (2010). Decisions from Experience in Conditions of Uncertainty. In Paper presented at 2010 Experience, heuristics, and choice: Prospects for bounded rationality workshop at Carnegie Mellon University. Pittsburgh, PA, USA.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2010). Physical Representation and Linear Thinking on Climate Change. In Paper presented at the 2010 Society of Risk Analysis Annual Meeting. Salt Lake City, Utah, USA.</li>
<li>
Gonzalez, C., & <b>Dutt, V.</b> (2010). Instance-based Learning Models of Training. In Paper presented at the 54th Annual Meeting of the Human Factors and Ergonomics Society. San Francisco, CA, USA.</li>
<li>
Proctor R.W., Yamaguchi, M., Gonzalez, C., & <b>Dutt, V.</b> (2010). Spatial Compatibility Effects in a Complex Task Environment. In Paper presented at the 2010 American Psychological Association Convention. San Diego, CA, USA.</li>
<li>
Walter, W., <b>Dutt, V.</b>, Gluck, K., & Reitter, D. (2010). Results and Lessons Learned from the 2009 DSF Modeling Comparison Challenge. In Symposium presented at the 2010 Behavioral Representation in Modeling Simulation conference. Charleston, SC, USA.    </li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2009). Human Control of Climate. In Poster presented at the 2009 Summer Institute on Bounded Rationality. Berlin, Germany.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2009). Climate Risk Communication: A Cure for People’s Mental Models. In Paper presented at the 2009 Society of Risk Analysis Annual Meeting. Baltimore, MD.</li>
<li>
Lebiere, C., Gonzalez, C., <b>Dutt, V.</b>, Warwick, W. (2009). Predicting cognitive performance in open-ended dynamic tasks a modeling comparison challenge. In Symposium at 2009 9th International Conference on Cognitive Modeling. Manchester: UK.</li>
<li>
Gonzalez, C., <b>Dutt, V.</b>, Healy, A., Young, M. & Bourne, L. (2009). Comparison of instance and strategy models in ACT-R. In A. Howes, D. Peebles, R. Cooper (Eds.), 9th International Conference on Cognitive Modeling – ICCM2009, Manchester, UK.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, Yamaguchi, M., Gonzalez, C., & Proctor, R. (2009). An Instance-Based Learning Model of Stimulus-Response Compatibility Effects in Mixed Location-Relevant and Location-Irrelevant Tasks. In Poster presented at 2009 9th International Conference on Cognitive Modeling. Manchester: UK.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2009). A Model of Human Perceptions of Climate Change. In Paper presented at American Society for Engineering Education (ASEE) Spring 2009 Northeast Conference. Bridgeport, CT.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2009). How do we perceive carbon-dioxide lifetimes? In Paper presented at USSEE 2009 Conference. Washington D.C., MD.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2009). Human "Mis"- perceptions of Climate Change. In Paper presented at the HFES 53rd Annual Meeting. San Antonio, TX.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2008). Human Perceptions of Climate Change. In Paper presented at the 26th International Conference of the System Dynamics Society. Athens, Greece.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2008). Human Perceptions of Climate Change. In Paper presented at the 3rd Annual - Student Industrial Ecology Conference, University of Pittsburgh – Benedum Hall, Kresge Auditorium Rm. 1175, Pittsburgh, PA.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2008). Human Perceptions of Climate Change. In Paper presented at the 2008 American Psychological Association Convention’s Symposium Decision Making in Dynamic and Complex Environments. Boston, MA, USA.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2008). Instance and strategy based models in ACT-R. In Proceedings of 2008 Modeling, Simulation & Gaming (MS&G) Student Capstone Conference (pp. 19). Suffolk, VA: ODU-VMASC.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2008). Instance and Strategy ACT-R models of choice in a dynamic control task: a model comparison story. Proceedings of 2008 Fifteenth Annual Workshop and Summer School (pp. 43). Pittsburgh, PA: ACT-R RESEARCH GROUP.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2008). Risk Perceptions of Climate Change. In Paper presented at the 2008 Society of Risk Analysis Annual Meeting. Boston, MA.</li>
<li>
Young, M. D., Healy, A. F., Gonzalez, C., <b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Bourne, L. E., Jr. (2008). Effects of training with added relevant responses on RADAR detection. The Experimental Psychology Society and the Psychonomic Society, Chicago, IL.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, & Gonzalez, C. (2007). Slope of inflow impacts dynamic decision making. In Paper presented at the 25th (2007) International Conference of the System Dynamics Society. Boston, MA, USA.</li>
<li>
Gonzalez, C., & <b>Dutt, V.</b> (2007). Learning to control a dynamic task: A system dynamics cognitive model of the slope effect.  In Paper presented at the 8th International Conference on Cognitive Modeling, Ann Arbor, MI, 26th July 2007, 61-66.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>, Schmerl, B., & Garlan, D. (Unpublished). Discovering Communication Protocols between Software Elements (runtime objects) in Software Architectures. Part of Independent Study taken when pursuing Master's in Software Engineering, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>  & Kumar, S.  (2006). Learning Transistor Characteristics using Neural Networks. Published in ECCS 2006. Patiala, India.</li>
<li>
<b>Dutt, V.</b>  & Thiagaraj, V.  (2005). The Concept of Classification in Data Mining using Neural Networks. Published in NCBC 2005. Patiala, India.</li>
</ul>

<h2 class="page_heading">Dr. Timothy A. Gonsalves</h2>

<div id="data_container">

<div id="data">

<div id="data_top">

<div id="data_bottom">

<div class="data_field">

<h3>Education</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li> B. Tech. (Electronics), I.I.T., Madras, 1976</li>
<li>M. S. (Electrical), Rice University, Houston, Texas, 1979</li>
<li>Ph. D. (Electrical), Stanford University, California, 1986</li>
</li>
</ul></div>

</div>


<div class="data_field">

<h3>Interests</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Applied research in distributed applications, quality of service, network protocols, mobile/voice-based applications.</li>
<li>Development of products and technology in computer networks and telecommunications, especially aimed at mass markets in developing countries.</li>
<li>Promotion of software development in rural areas.</li>
<li>Teaching in systems areas of computer science and engineering.</li>
</ul></div>
</div>


<div class="data_field">


<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Employment</h3>
<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Department of Computer Science, WPI, Worcester, Massachusetts:
	Assistant Professor, 1986-1988.</li>
<li>Department of Computer Science & Engg, I.I.T., Madras:
	Assistant Professor (1989) - Professor (present)
	<br/>Head of Department (Aug 2005 – Jan 2010)</li>
<li>Nilgiri Networks, Ooty:
	Director, 1999 - 2001 (on leave from IIT)</li>
<li>Indian Institute of Technology, Mandi
	Director, Jan 2010 – (present)</li>
</ul></div>

</div>


<div class="data_field large_df">

<h3>Professional Activities</h3>

<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>Cofounder of the TeNeT Group (Telecommunications and Computer Networking) of IIT-Madras, 1992-present.</li>
<li>Helped IIT alumni found R&D companies -- Midas Communications, Banyan Networks, NMSWorks Software and ISoftTech.</li>
<li>Founded Nilgiri Networks, Ooty for telecom software development in a small town.</li>
<li>Director of NMSWorks Software Ltd and IIT-M Rural Technology Business Incubator.</li>
<li>Consultant to State Bank of India, Institute for Development and Research in Banking Technology (IDRBT), and 3i Infotech.</li>
<li>Conference/Program Co-Chair, IFIP Home Oriented IT Conference (HOIT 2007), Aug 2007, IIT-Madras.</li>
<li>Member, Technology Committee, Mobile Payment Forum of India (2007-10)</li>
</ul>
</div>

</div>


<div class="data_field large_df">

<h3>Recent R&D Projects (PI or Joint-PI)</h3>

<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>Mobile Payment Certification Lab: definition of standards for mobile payments in India, and provision of certification/testing services.<br/>
Sponsor: DIT - Rs. 48 lakhs, Apr. 2009 – Mar 2011</li>
<li>Indo-UK Advanced Technology Centre, PI for the Security & Resilience of Next Generation Networks Theme, Joint-PI for the Seamless Mobility and Disaster Recovery and Cross-Layer Energy Aware Network Management Themes.  Coordinator for Rural Applications and Seamless Mobility Themes.  Applied research and exchange of PhD students in various aspects of Next Generation Networks.<br/>
Sponsor: DST + EPSRC (UK)<br/>
 	<ul>
	<li>Security & Resilience of Next Generation Networks Theme: Rs. 1.22 crores</li>
 	<li>Seamless Mobility and Disaster Recovery Theme: Rs. 1.22 crores</li>
 	<li>Cross-Layer Energy Aware Network Management Theme: Rs. 1.76 crores</li>
 	<li>Overall  project: Rs. 20 crores; 2009-2011</li></ul></li>
<li>Distributed workflow for rural applications.  R&D and development of prototypes for rural enterprises that are scalable across India’s 6,00,000 villages.<br/>
Sponsor: Xerox Innovation Group, Rochester, USA. $1,50,000, Jan 2009-Dec 2011</li>
<li>Advanced Research In Communication And Information Technologies Sponsor: coordinated research in 12 areas of computer science that are of interest to DRDO.<br/>
Sponsor:  Centre for Artificial Intelligence, DRDO, Bangalore -	Rs. 2.0 crores, 2008-2013.</li>
<li>Rural Technology Business Incubator (RTBI): to promote technologies and entrepreneurship for rural applications.<br/>
Sponsors: DST + World Bank - Rs. 6 crores, 2007-2011.</li>
<li>Microsoft Technologies Lab: research and training in Microsoft OS technologies.<br//>
Sponsor: Microsoft Corp, USA - $2,05,000, 2008-2010.</li>
<li>Advanced Network Management System: architecture, design and implementation of an integrated NMS for convergent telecom networks.<br/>
Sponsor: NMSWorks Software, Chennai - Rs. 80 lakhs, 2002-2009.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>


<div class="data_field large_df">

<h3>Completed R&D Projects (selected)</h3>

<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>Access terminal:  embedded software, real-time OS for low-cost access terminals based on Leon and other processors; local language softwarefor Linux.<br/>
Sponsor: Novatium Solutions, Chennai</li>
<li>Rural Automatic Teller Machine: design and implementation of the software of a Rs. 50,000 ATM that has been successfully commercialized.<br/>
Sponsor: Vortex Engineering, Chennai</li>
<li>corDECT Wireless Local Loop:  design and implementation of the embedded switching software running on Linux OS; performance evaluation of the system.<br/>
Sponsor: Midas Communications, Chennai</li>
<li>Direct Internet Access System: system architecture, soft-switching concept.<br/>
Sponsor: Midas Communications, Chennai</li>
<li>Minnow+BlueBill Internet Infrastructure Software: Linux-based Internet services and billing for telecom operators, scalable from 100-1, 00,000 subscribers
LAN-T: design and implementation of a LAN trainer kit for educational use.  In use by over 100 colleges in India, South Asia, Australia and UK.<br/>
Sponsor: Benchmark Microsystems, Chennai</ li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>

</ul>

<li>A. Jhunjhunwala, B. Ramamurthi & T.A. Gonsalves, "The Role of Technology in Telecom Expansion in India", IEEE Communications Mag., vol. 36, no. 11, Nov. 98, pp. 88-94.</li>
<li>R.K. Sanghi, Ashok Jhunjhunwala & T.A. Gonsalves, "Fibre Optics Ethernet Network for Voice and Data Communication", J. IETE, v 41, n2, Mar--Apr. 95, pp. 119--128.</li>
<li>S. Mahesh, C. Sivaram Murthy, T.A. Gonsalves & C. Pandurangan,"Modeling and Simulation of Dynamic Job Scheduling in MultiprocessorSystems", Int'l. J. Comp. Maths, v 58, 95, pp. 221--247.</li>
<li>A. Jhunjhunwala, M. Archana Rao, B. Murugesh, T.A. Gonsalves, & B. Ramamurthi, "A Reliable Fibre-Optic Ring Network for Process Control", Int'l J. Optoelectronics, v 8, n 4, 93, pp. 477-491.</li>
<li>M. Thomas, A. Jhunjhunwala, B. Ramamurthi & T.A. Gonsalves, "Designand Performance Evaluation of a Low Bit-Rate Packet Radio Network”, Jour. IETE, v 39, n 5, Sep-Oct. 93, pp. 281-290.</li>
<li>T.A. Gonsalves, "High-Speed Transport Protocols: Design and Implementation Issues", Jour. IETE, v 39, n 2, May-June 93,pp. 99-109.</li>

<li>T.A. Gonsalves & F.A. Tobagi, "On the Performance Effects of Station Locations and Access Protocol Parameters in Ethernet Networks", IEEE Tr. Commun., v COM-36, n 4, Apr. 88, pp. 441-449.</li>
</ul>

  <h3>Projects/Awards</h3>
  <div class="data">
    <ul>
      <li>Simons Associate Award of ICTP, Trieste, Italy starting from Jan 1, 2015 </li>
      <li>CSIR- RA (Direct Award) </li>
      <li>Research project entitled &quot;<b>Advanced computational studies of dynamic phenomena in magnetic nano-materials</b>&quot; under &quot;2008 India- European commission coordinated (joint) call for proposal in Computational Material Science&acirc;&euro;&#157; program.  Collaborating institutes with in India are: SN Bose Institute, Kolkata, Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Indian Institute of Sciences Bangalore and IIT Mandi, Mandi. The Collaborating partners from Europe are: Univ of Exeter in UK, Univ of Southampton, UK, Univ of Ferrara, Italy and AMU, Poland. The starting date of the project is June 1, 2009. The project was for three years but extended till March, 2013. </li>
      <li>Research project entitled &quot;<b>Computational engineering of nano materials</b>&quot; is currently running under Nano Mission scheme of Department of Science &amp; Technology, Government of India. The project started on Sept 1, 2009. The project was for three years but it is extended till Feb 2013. </li>
      <li>The research project entitled &quot;<b>Structured Programming through e-Learning</b>&quot; is sanctioned under International Higher Education Programme of British Council. The partner institutes are IIT Mandi, IIT Madras and University of Southampton, UK. The starting date of the project is Sept 1, 2012.</li>
      <li>The collaborative project &quot;<b>India-UK Advanced Technology Centre (IU-ATC)</b>&quot; is sanctioned to a consortium of Institutes in India and UK. IIT Mandi is one partner in this consortium. Starting date of the project is Aug 1, 2012.
        <p><b><i>My role in all these projects: Principal Investigator</i></b></p>
      </li>
    </ul>

<div class="data_field large_df">
  <h3>Centers and labs set up in IIT Mandi </h3>
  <div class="data">
    <ul>
      <li>
        <h4>Center for Innovative Technologies for Himalayan Region (CITHR)</h4>
      </li>
CITHR is set up at IIT Mandi under the DST sanctioned project for doing the Scoping study to set up CSTRI Center at IIT Mandi. This is new scheme of DST to promote technology penetration in rural India. The activity started on Sept 1, 2012.<br />
<li>
  <h4>Aakash Application Development Lab (AADL)</h4>
</li>
AADL is set up for developing various  application oriented projects on android platform entitled &quot; Aakash Application Development Lab (AADL): Applications for Scalable Teaching in Engineering&quot; sanctioned through the lead Institute, IIT Madras, under the Centrally Sponsored Plan Scheme of <b>National Mission on Education through Information and Communication Technology</b>. Starting date of the project is Aug 1, 2012.
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>

<h3>Recent Invited Talks</h3>
<div class="data">
  <ol>
    <li><span class="data">Magnetoelectric Multiferroics <br>

<h3>Research interests</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>AC drives and control
</li><li>Offline and Real-time Simulation of Electrical Systems</li>

</li>
</ul></div>

</li>

Ph.D. in Electrical Engg. (Power Electronics and Power Systems) from
Indian Institute of Technology Bombay, Mumbai, Maharashtra<br/>
Thesis title: Single-inverter Multi-machine Induction Motor Drives

<div id="left_column">
<h2 class="page_heading"> Dr. Ramesh Oruganti </h2>
<div id="data_container">
<div id="data">
<div id="data_top"><img src="images/ROruganti.jpg" height="200px" alt="Dr. Ramesh Oruganti" />
<div id="contact_info">

<div id="data_bottom">
<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<h3>Education </h3>
<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>Ph.D, Virginia Tech, (1987) - Electrical Engineering</li>
<li>M.Tech, IIT Madras (1972)  - Electrical Engineering</li>
<li>B.Tech, IIT Madras (1969) - Electrical Engineering</li>

</ul>
</div>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<h3>Work Experience</h3>
<div class="data">
<ul><li>Visiting Professor, IIT Mandi (29th January 2013 onwards).</li>
<li>R&D Consultant - (July 2010-Jan 2013).</li>
<li>Senior Visiting Fellow, UNSW, Australia (July 2007 to May 2008).</li>
<li>Associate Professor/Senior Lecturer, NUS, Singapore (1989-2010).</li>
<li>R&D Engineer, Corporate R&D, Schenectady, USA (1987-89).</li>
<li>Prior Experience: BHEL, Bangalore, Best & Crompton Engineering Ltd, Madras & IIT, Madras.</li></ul>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<h3>Professional Affiliation</h3>
<div class="data">
<ul>Senior Member, IEEE, USA</ul>
</div>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<h3>Research Interests</h3>
<div class="data">

<ul>My current research interest is in the area of power electronic applications in renewable electrical energy systems and, in particular, in solar photovoltaic energy systems. The areas which I have been working on together with my students and collaborators over the years are<br><br>

<ul><u>Efficient and high performance DC-DC power conversion</u><br><br>
	
<li>Resonant & soft-switched power converters</li>
<li>Power converter analysis and modeling</li>
<li>Synchronous rectifiers for efficient low d.c. output voltage power conversion</li>
<li>Voltage regulator modules for high performance computing applications</li>
<li>Fast dynamic boost / buck-boost power converters</li></ul><br>
<ul>

<u>AC to DC power converters for improved power quality </u><br><br>

<li>Efficient single phase power factor correction schemes for computer and other power supplies</li>
<li>High performance three phase pulse-width modulated power converters and their control</li>
<li>Conducted EMI noise and mitigation in a.c. to d.c. power converters</li> </ul><br><br>

<ul><u>High-performance stand-alone and grid-connected inverters for renewable energy and other applications</u><br><br>

<li>Fast response control of inverter with excellent output voltage quality under linear and non-linear loads </li>
<li>Novel PWM techniques to solve the time delay problem in inverters for obtaining greater output voltage</li>
<li>Resonant power conversion schemes for grid connected fuel cell systems</li>
<li>Topologies and control schemes for single-stage ac modules for solar photovoltaic systems</li>


</ul><br><br>
Several of these power electronics related topics are also very relevant in electrical systems for renewable energy applications including solar photovoltaic systems.  Developing economical schemes capable of excellent performance in terms of efficiency, life and control performance will continue to be a major challenge in the introduction and acceptance of renewable electric energy systems. <br><br>

Lastly, as we are all aware, mankind's addiction to cheap and convenient energy sources and carriers has created a global crisis which only promises to worsen with time. The problems as well as the possible mitigations and solutions straddle numerous disciplines, such as, science, engineering (including the field of power electronics), economics and policy. People with different domain expertise have opportunities to collaborate and contribute in this critical area.

</div>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Supervision of Research Students</h3>
<div class="data">
<h5>Ph. D Degree</h5>
<ul>
<li>Li Yanlin: Topology Studies  and Control of Microinverters for Photovoltaic Application (Thesis submitted in January 2013)</li>
<li>Krishna Mainali: Analysis and Mitigation of Conducted EMI in Switched-Mode Power Supplies</li>
<li>Yin Bo: High Performance Control of a Three-phase PWM Rectifier</li>
<li>Xu Xinyu: A soft-switch back-to-back bi-directional DC-DC converter and the FPGA based digital control design (2nd supervisor)</li>
<li>Deng Heng: High Performance Digital Control of UPS Inverters</li>
<li>K. Viswanathan: Dynamic performance improvement in boost and buck-boost-derived power electronic converters</li>
<li>Ramesh Srinivasan: Single Phase Power Factor Correction Investigation and Development of Advanced Techniques</li></ul>
<h5>M. Eng Degree (by Research)</h5>
<ul>
<li>18 students have been supervised so far.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>


<div class="data_field" align="justify">

<h3>Publications  </h3>

<h5>Publications in Journals </h5>

<li>Rathore, A, A.K.S. Bhat and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Analysis, Design and Experimental Results of Wide Range ZVS Active-Clamped L-L Type Current-Fed DC/DC Converter for Fuel Cells to Utility Interface". IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics, Jan 2012.</li> 

<li>Krishna, M and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Conducted EMI Mitigation Techniques for Switch Mode Power Converters - A Survey". IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS, 25, no. 9 (2010): 2344-2356.</li> 

<li>Li, Y and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "A flyback-CCM inverter scheme for photovoltaic AC module application".  Australasian Journal of Electrical & Electronic Engineering,  6, no. 3  (2009).</li> 

<li>Yin, B, <b>R Oruganti</b>, S K Panda and AKS Bhat, "A simple single input single output (SISO) model for a three-phase PWM rectifier".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  24, no. 3  (2009): 620-631. </li> 

<li>Deng, H, D Srinivasan and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "B-spline Network Based Neural Controller for Power Electronics Application".  NEUROCOMPUTING,  (2009).  (Netherlands).</li>

<li>Deng, H, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "Neural Controller for UPS Inverters Based on B-Spline Network". IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INDUSTRIAL ELECTRONICS, 55, no. 2  (2008): 899-909.  </li> 

<li>Deng, H, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "A Simple Control Method for High Performance UPS Inverters through Output Impedance Reduction".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INDUSTRIAL ELECTRONICS, 55, no. 2  (2008): 888-898.  </li> 

<li>Deng, H, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "High performance control of UPS inverters using a B-spline network".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INDUSTRIAL ELECTRONICS,  March, 2008.</li> 

<li>Krishna, M, <b>R Oruganti</b>, V Kanakasabai and SP Ng, "A metric for evaluating the EMI spectra of power converters".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  23, no. (2008): 2075-2081. </li> 
 
<li>Viswanathan, K and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Evaluation of power losses in a boost PFC unit by temperature measurements".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INDUSTRY APPLICATIONS,  43, no. 5  (2007): 1320-1328.</li> 
  
<li>Deng, H, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "Analysis and Design of Iterative Learning Control Strategies for UPS Inverters".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INDUSTRIAL ELECTRONICS,  54, no. 3  (2007): 1739-1751.</li> 
  
<li>Xu, Xinyu, A M Khambadkone, M L Toh and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "A 1MHz Zero-Voltage-Switching Asymmetrical Half-Bridge DC-DC Converter: Analysis and Design.".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  21, no. 1  (2006): 105-113. </li>

<li>Viswanathan, K, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "Dual mode control of tri-state boost converter for improved performance".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS, 20, no. 4  (2005): 790-795. </li> 
 
<li>Deng, H, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "PWM methods to handle time delay in digital control of UPS inverters".  IEEE Power Electronics Letters,  3, no. 1  (2005): 1-6.</li> 

<li>Viswanathan, K,<b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "A novel tri-state boost converter with fast dynamics".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  17, no. 5  (2002): 677-683.</li> 

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>  and M Palaniapan, "Extension of Inductor Voltage Control to Three Phase Buck Type Converter".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  15, no. 2  (2000): 295-302.</li> 

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>  and M Palaniapan, "Inductor Voltage Control of Buck Type Single Phase AC-DC Converter".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  15, no. 2  (2000): 411-417.</li> 

<li>Pan, H, Y C Liang and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Design of Smart Power Synchronous Rectifier".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS, 14, no. 2 (1999): 308-315.</li> 
  
<li>Mi, N L, <b>R Oruganti</b> and S X Chen, "Modelling of Hysterisis effects in Ferrite Cores excited by Transient Magnetic Field".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON MAGNETICS,  34, no. 4  (1998): </li> 

<li>Srinivasan, R and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "A unity power factor converter using half bridge boost topology".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  13, no. 3  (1998): 487-500. </li> 
 
<li><b>Oruganti, R</b> , K Nagaswami and K S Lock, "Predicted (on-time) equal charge criterion scheme for constant frequency control of single phase boost type AC-DC converters".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  13, no. 1  (1998): 47-57. </li> 

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b> , C H Phua, K G Tan and A C Liew, "Soft-switched DC/DC converter with PWM control".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  13, no. 1  (1998): 102-114. </li> 

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>  and R Srinivasan, "Single Phase Power Factor converters - A Review".  SADHANA-ACADEMY PROCEEDINGS IN ENGINEERING SCIENCES,  22, no. 6. 1997: 753-780. </li>

<li>Seah, C E, <b>R Oruganti</b> and Y C Liang, "An automated algorithm for small signal analysis of DC-DC converters".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  11, no. 1  (1996): 45-52. </li>  

<li>Liang, Y C, <b>R Oruganti</b> and T B Oh, "Design optimisation of power MOSFET for high frequency synchronous rectification".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS, 10, no. 3  (1995): 388-395. </li> 
 
<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>  and C H Tan, "Resonant-tank control of parallel resonant converter".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  PE-8, no. 2  (1993): 127-134. </li>

<li>Tsai, F S, <b>R Oruganti</b> and F C Lee, "A novel control for bidirectional power flow of a parallel resonant converter".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INDUSTRY APPLICATIONS,  IA-23, no. 5  (1987): 937-443.</li> 
  
<li>Jovanovic, M M, K H Liu, <b>R Oruganti</b> and F C Lee, "State plane analysis of quasi-resonant converters".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  PE-2, no. 1  (1987): 36-44.</li> 

<li>Liu, K H, <b>R Oruganti</b> and F C Lee, "Quasi-resonant converters - Topologies and characteristics".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON POWER ELECTRONICS,  PE-2, no. 1  (1987): 62-71. </li>

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>  and F C Lee, "Resonant power processors, part I- State plane analysis".  IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON INDUSTRY APPLICATIONS,  IA-21, no. 6  (1985): 1453-1460. </li> 
 
<li><b>Oruganti, R</b> and A Bhandari, "Characteristics of semiconductor fuses for SCR protection".  Journal of the Institute of Electrical and Tele. Comm EngRs., India,  29, no. 2  (1983): 77-82.  (India).</li> </ul>


<h5>Selected Conference Papers</h5>
<ul type="1">

<li>Rathore, A. K. S. Bhat, and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "High-frequency current-fed fuel cell inverter for residential use," IEEE Power Electronics, Drives and Energy System (PEDES) Conference. New Delhi, India, 21-23 Dec 2010.</li>

<li>Li Yanlin, <b>R Oruganti</b>, "A Flyback-CCM Inverter Scheme for Photovoltaic AC Module Application". Proceedings of the Australasian Universities Power Engineering Programme, AUPEC-08, Sydney, Dec 2008.</li>

<li>R Oruganti<b> R Oruganti</b>rnational Conference on Energy Technologies and Policy. 7-10 Sep 2008, University of Birmingham, United Kingdom.</li>

<li>Krishna, M and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Design of a Current-Sense Voltage-Feedback Common Mode EMI Filter for an Off-line Power Converter".  Proceedings of the IEEE 39th Power Electronics Specialists Conference (PESC 2008).  15 - 19 Jun 2008, Rhodes, Greece.</li>

<li>Xu, Xinyu, A M Khambadkone and <b>R Oruganti</b>, " A Soft-Switched Back-to-Back Bi-directional DC/DC Converter with a FPGA based Digital Control for Automotive applications".  Proceedings of Industrial Electronics Society, 2007. IECON 2007. 33rd Annual Conference of the IEEE (2007).  United States: IEEE.  5 -  8 Nov 2007, Taipei, Taiwan.</li>

<li>Mainali, K and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Simple analytical models to predict EMI noise in a power electronic converter".  Proceedings of Industrial Electronics Society, 2007. IECON 2007. 33rd Annual Conference of the IEEE (2007).  United States: IEEE.  5 - 8 Nov 2007, Taipei, Taiwan.</li>

<li>Rathore, A K, A K S Bhat and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "A Comparison of Soft-Switched DC-DC Converters for Fuel Cell to Utility Interface Application".  Proceedings of the Power Conversion Conference, PCC '07 (2007): 588-594.   2 - 5 Apr 2007, Nagoya, Japan.</li>

<li>Marecar, H and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Fast and Accurate Current Sensing in a Multiphase Buck Converter".  Proceedings of IEEE Power Electronics and Drive Systems Conference (2005).  IEEE.  28 Nov - 1 Dec 2005, Kuala Lumpur.</li>

<li>Deng, H, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "Modeling and Control of Single Phase UPS Inverters: A Survey".  Proceedings of IEEE Power Electronics and Drive Systems Conference (2005).  IEEE.  28 Nov - 1 Dec 2005, Kuala Lumpur.</li>

<li>Cao, X and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Fast Response Control of Stepping Inductance Voltage Regulator Module".  IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conference (2005).
 </li>
<li>Viswanathan, K, <b>R Oruganti</b> and D Srinivasan, "Dual-mode control of buck-boost PFC converter".  IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conference Record (PESC 2004): 2178-2184.  20 - 25 Jun 2004, Aachen, Germany.</li>

<li>Srinivasan, R, M Palaniapan and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "A single phase two-switch buck type AC-DC converter topology with inductor voltage control".  IEEE power electronics specialists conference record '97 (PESC '97) (1997): 556-563.  USA: IEEE.  1 Jun 1997, St Louis, USA.</li>

<li>Li, X and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "A soft-switching PWM converter with synchronous rectification".  Proceedings of IEEE International Telecommunications Energy Conference '96 (INTELEC'96)   (1 Oct 1996, United States).</li>

<li>Dubey, G K, <b>R Oruganti</b>, C S Chang and K Chatterjee, "Harmonic elimination in high power GTO converter using an auxiliary converter with zero fundamental power".  1996 International Conference on Power Electronics, Drives and Energy Systems for Industrial Growth (1996): New Delhi: Institute of Electrical and Electrical Engineers. 1 Jan 1996, India.</li>

<li>Seah, C E and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Large signal and steady state analyses of DC-DC power converters".  International Conference on Power Electronics and Drive Systems (1995). Singapore: IEEE Singapore Section. 21 - 24 Feb 1995, Singapore.</li>

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b> and Y T Cham, "A novel PFC scheme for AC to DC converter with reduced losses". IEEE Industrial Electronics Conference Record (1994). 5 - 9 Sep 1994, Bologna, Italy.</li>
<li>Phua, C H and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Family of two-switch soft-switched asymmetrical PWM DC/DC converters".  IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conference Record (1994): 85-94.  21 - 24 Jun 1994, Taipei, Taiwan. </li>

<li>Liang, Y C, T B Oh and <b>R Oruganti</b>, "Design optimisation of power MOSFET for high frequency synchronous rectification". IEEE IECON'93 (1993): 767-772.  15 - 19 Nov 1993,  Hawaii, United States.</li>

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>, K M Chua and K S Lock, "Power conversion using a rotating field transformer".  Proceedings of the 3rd international symposium on electricity distribution and energy management (ISEDEM '93) (1993).  Singapore: IEEE Singapore.  27 - 29 Oct 1993.</li>

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>and F C Lee, "Effects of parasitic losses on the performance of series resonant converter".  IEEE-IAS-1985 Annual Meeting, Conference Rec. (1985): 1233-1243.</li>
  
<li><b>Oruganti, R</b>and F C Lee, "State plane analysis of parallel resonant converter".  IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conference Rec. (1985): 56-73. </li>
  
<li><b>Oruganti, R</b> and F C Lee, "Resonant power processors, part II- Methods of control".  IEEE-IAS-1984 Annual Meeting, Conference Rec. (1984): 868-878. </li>

<li><b>Oruganti, R</b> and F C Lee, "Resonant power processors, part I - State plane analysis".  IEEE-IAS-1984 Annual Meeting, Conference Rec. (1984): 860- 867.</li></ul>

</div>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<div class="data_field large_df">

<div class="data">

</div>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Research Funding</h3>
<div class="data">
<h5>As the Principal Investigator or as the Major Contributor:</h5>
<ul>
<li>"Improving the Performance of Active Power Factor Correction Scheme" Funded by M/s. Nemic Lambda (S) Pte Ltd - 2005~2007. Funding S$180000. </li> 

<li>"Dynamic Voltage Restorer System for Power Quality Improvement" University Research Project - 2000~2003. Funding S$50600. </li>


<li>"Power Quality Improvement Using Artificial Intelligence Techniques" University Research Project - 2001~2004. Funding S$73786. </li>

<li>"Three Phase AC-DC Converters for Improved Power Quality" University Research Project - 2001~2006. Funding S$68100. Collaboration with University of Victoria. </li>

<li>"New Generation Power Supply Development" together with M/s. Nemic Lambda (S) Pte Ltd - 1991~1994. Funded by the National Science and Technology Board. The research has resulted in a patent and also an advanced DC-DC converter module being introduced by Nemic Lambda in their product range. </li>
</ul>
<h5>As Collaborator</h5>
<ul>
<li>"Universal Power Electronic Cell" University Research Project - 2000~2004. Funding S$68600. Collaborator.</li>
<li>"Neural Network Tooled Power Electronic Design Automation" University Research Project - 1991~1993. Funding S$72000. Collaborator.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Research Accomplishments</h3>
<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>First Prize paper - IEEE Transactions on Power Electronics in 2000 for the year 1999 (with Liang, YC & Pan, H).</li>

<li>Invited paper (with Srinivasan, R) in the "Special Issue on Recent Advances in Power Electronics and Drives", Sadhana, Indian Academy of Sciences, December 1997. </li>

<li>A conference paper (with Phua, CH) included in the IEEE Press Book, "Power Electronics Technology and Applications", 1996.</li>

<li>A conference paper (with Lee, FC) included in the IEEE Press Book, "Modern Power Electronics", 1992.</li>

<li>Two conference papers (Part I & Part II) (with Lee, FC) together were awarded the first prize of the Static Power Converter Committee at the IEEE-IAS-1984 annual meeting.</li>

<li>Fast response 'Optimal Trajectory Control' method proposed for a series resonant power converter has been adopted by GE-Medical (and possibly by other medical imaging equipment manufacturers) for controlling power in their Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) equipment.</li>

<li>Patent: R Oruganti, CH Phua and J Tan, "DC-DC Converter", Japanese Patent: 2751961 (1998). This is still used by the company in one of its DC-DC converter product line.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>

<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Teaching</h3>
<div class="data">
<h5>The courses developed and taught at NUS include</h5>
<ul>
<li>EE3501/TE3501 Power Electronics.</li>
<li>EE5711 Power Electronics and Systems.</li>
<li>EE6002 Switch Mode Power Conversion.</li>
<li>EE4510 Solar Photovoltaic Energy Systems.</li>
<li>EG2401 Engineering Professionalism.</li>

</ul>
<h5>Teaching Honours</h5>
<ul>
<li>In the Faculty Teaching Honours list for 1998/99.</li>
<li>A Faculty of Engineering nominee for the University's Outstanding Educator award in 2001.</li>
<li>In the Department's Teaching Commendation List during (2002-03) and (2003-04).</li>

</ul>
</div>
</div>


<div class="data_field" align="justify">
<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Service</h3>
<div class="data">
<h5>At the University</h5>
<ul>
<li>Director, Centre for Power Electronics (1994 - 2008).</li>
<li>Chairman of the working committee for the 'Engineering Professionalism' module (2003-04).</li>
 
<li>Deputy Group Head of Drives, Power and Control Systems Group and Section Head of Drives & Power (2002-2007). </li>

<li>Graduate Programme Coordinator (2009-10). </li>

<li>Member, Purchase Authorisation Committee. </li>

<li>Member, Curriculum Task Force committee .</li>

<li>Supervisor, Power Electronics Laboratory (1995-2003). </li>

</ul>
<h5>Professional</h5>
<ul><li>Was instrumental in starting the series of IEEE Power Electronics and Drive Systems (PEDS) Conferences together with other interested professionals in Singapore. Was the Organizing Chairman for the first PEDS'95 in Singapore. After the second PEDS conference, also in Singapore, a PEDS Management Committee was set up in Singapore under the IEEE Singapore Section in order to promote and manage the IEEE-PEDS conferences in the region. This conference is now an important Power Electronics Conference in IEEE's annual calendar.
</li>

<li>Invited member of Program Committee (Power Electronics) of the 2003 IEEE Industrial Electronics Society Annual Conference (IECON'03) and other conferences.

<li>Invited Organizing Committee member of the 2002 IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conference (PESC'02)
Co-associate editor of the IEEE Press Book, "1996 Power Electronics Technology and Applications" under the IEEE Technology Update Series.</li>
<li>Technical Committee Member for the 1994 and 1996 IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conferences.</li>

<li>Member of the EV panel set up by the National Science and Technology Board in 1994.</li>

<li>Chairman, Power Electronics Study Panel set up by NSTB / 1994-95.</li>

<li>Short courses: 1) Switch-Mode Power Conversion & 2) Solar Photovoltaic Energy Systems .</li>

</ul>

</div>
</div>

<h3>Area of Interests</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Renewable Energies</li>
<li>Power Electronics & Grid Integration of Renewable Energies</li>
<li>Power System Harmonics</li>
<li>Power System Operation, Control and Analysis</li>
<li>Parameter estimation of electrical machines</li>
</ul></div>

<div class="data_field">

<h3>Educational Qualification</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>

<li>Masters of Technology (M.Tech.): Electrical Engineering (Power Apparatus and Electric Drives), Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee (India), Cumulative Grade Point Average (CGPA) 7.88/10.0, July 2005.
      Thesis Topic: Investigation of Harmonics on Power Distribution System
</li>
<li>Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.): Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur (India). Cumulative Performance Index (CPI) 9.0/10.0, September 2009.
      Thesis Topic: Reactive Power Capability and Performance Analysis of Grid  
      Connected Unified DFIG for Wind Power Application
</li>
</ul></div>

</div>

</ul>

<h4><u> Journals </u></h4><ul>

<li>B. S. Rajpurohit, S. N. Singh and I. Erlich "Wind Power in Electricity Markets: Key Issues and Challenges", International Journal of Energy Technology and Policy (IJETP), Vol. 6, No.3, pp. 196-211, 2008.</li>

</ul></div>

<div class="data_field large_df">

<h3>Conferences/Symposium Attended</h3>

<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>B. S. Rajpurohit and S. N. Singh "An efficient adaptive hysteresis band current controller for active power filters", IEEE-Bangalore Secton-15th Annual Symposiium on Technological Advances and IT Applications for Indian Power Sector, Nov. 24-25, 2006</li>

<li>Pradeep Kumar, Ajay Kumar, B. S. Rajpurohit and G. Singh "Space-Time Processing for Broadband Mobile Communication", International Conference on Information and communication Technology, Dehradun, India July 26-28, 2007, pp. 910-914.</li>
<li>B. S. Rajpurohit and S. N. Singh "Performance Evaluation of Current Control Algorithms Used for Active Power Filters," International Conference on "Computer as a tool (EUROCON 2007), Warsaw, Poland, pp. 2070-2075, Sept. 9-12, 2007.</li>
<li>B. S. Rajpurohit and S. N. Singh "Modeling of Wind Turbine for Power System Studies: Key Issues", International Conference on Power Systems, ICPS 2007, Dec. 12-14, 2007, Bangalore India.</li>
<li>Bharat Singh and S. N. Singh, "Power Electronic System Used in Wind Power Generation: Recent Trends and Future Challenges", International conference On Power system analysis, control and Optimization, PSACO-2008, March 13-15, 2008, Visakhapatnam, India, pp. 226-233.</li>
<li>Bharat Singh, V. Emmoji and S. N. Singh, "Performance Evaluation of Series and Parallel Connected Grid Side Converters of DFIG," IEEE PES General Meeting, July 20-24, 2008, Pittsburgh, USA.</li>
<li>Bharat Singh, V. Emmoji, S. N. Singh, and I. Erlich, "Performance Evaluation of New Series Connected Grid-Side Converter of Doubly-Fed Induction Generator", 2008 IEEE Power India Conference & POWERCON 2008, Oct. 12-15, 2008, New Delhi, India.</li>
<li>Bharat Singh, S. N. Singh, D. P. Papadopoulos and P. A. Katsigiannis "Advanced Grid Requirements for the Integration of Wind Turbines into Power System," 6th Mediterranean Conference and Exhibition on Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution (MEDPOWER 2008), Nov. 2-5, 2008, Thessaloniki, Greece. </li>
<li>Bharat Singh and S. N. Singh, "Renewable Energy Status and Vision in India," National Seminar on Non-Conventional Energy Resources & its Utilization, Feb. 27-28, 2009, KNIT Sultanpur, India, pp. 20-29 (Key Note). </li>
<li>Bharat Singh, S. N. Singh and Jacob Ostergaard, "Renewable Energy Generation in India: Present Scenario and Future Prospects," IEEE PES General Meeting, July 26-30, 2009, Calgary, Canada (Panel Paper). </li>
<li>Bharat Singh, S. N. Singh and Elias Kyriakides, "Computational Intelligence Based Control of DFIG Used for Wind Turbines," Nordic Wind Power Conference, September 10-11, 2009, Bornholm, Denmark. </li>
<li>Bharat Singh, S. N. Singh and Jacob Ostergaard, "Reactive Power Capability of Unified DFIG for Wind Power Generation," IEEE PES General Meeting, July 26-30, 2010, Minneapolis, USA (Panel Paper). </li>
<li>Bharat Singh, Elias Kyriakides and Sri Niwas Singh, "Intelligent Control of Grid Connected Unified Doubly-Fed Induction Generator," IEEE PES General Meeting, July 26-30, 2010, Minneapolis, USA. </li>
<li>Kang Lin, Elias Kyriakides, Gerald Heydt, Naim Logic and Bharat Singh, "Experience with Synchronous Generator Parameter Identification using a Kalman Filter," IEEE PES General Meeting, July 26-30, 2010, Minneapolis, USA.</li>
<li>Bharat Singh, Elias Kyriakides and Alex M. Michaelides, "Efficient Identification of Synchronous Machine Parameters through the Finite Elements Method," 7th Mediterranean Conference and Exhibition on Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution (MEDPOWER 2010), Nov. 7-10, 2010, Agia Napa, Cyprus . </li>
<li>B. S. Rajpurohit, S. N. Singh and L. Wang. Technical and Economical Practices for Alternative Energy in India, In IEEE PES General Meeting, July 22-26, 2012, San Diego, USA.</li>

<h2 class="page_heading">Dr. Satinder Kumar Sharma </h2>
<div id="data_container">
<div id="data">

<div id="data_top"><img src="images/Satinder Image2.jpg" height="200px" alt="Dr. Satinder Kumar Sharma" />

<div id="data_bottom">
<div class="data_field">
<h3>Research Interests</h3>
<div class="data" align="justify">
<ul>
<li><b>VLSI Technology</b> :Synthesis and characterization of   Multiple thickness gate oxides for SOC system, 
High-k gate dielectric stacks charge trapping for CMOS Technology and ions irradiated scaled MOSFET for space   application, VLSI design for digital and analog circuits, reconfigurable computing, device modeling and  simulation, flexible  and  bio- compatible  integration of  nano- electronics and piezoelectric materials for MEMS devices etc. </li><br>

<li><b>Nano Science and Nanotechnology</b>:   1D, 0D nanostructures of  ZnO, TiO2 , ZnS, CdSe, CdS,  Polyannaline  synthesis and  characterization of electronic, optical and magnetic properties for various applications. ZnO/PANI coaxial nanostructures for Solar cell application, Functionalized  metal/semiconductor nano-particles for Surafce Plasmon,Chemisorptions and Biological Sensors application.  Self-organized meso-patterning of polymers, polymer thin films  wetting/ dewetting and polymer nanocomposite instability etc.</li><br>

</ul></div></div>
<div class="data_field">
<h3>Employment</h3>
<div class="data"><br />
<ul>
<li>Faculty in school of Computing and Electrical Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)-
     Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, (India). </li>

<li>Faculty in Electronics and Microelectronics Division at Indian Institute of Information Technology-(IIIT)-Allahabad, (India), from  2010-2012.</li>

<li>Research Scientist, in DST Unit on Nanosciences at Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)- Kanpur, (India) from 2007-2010.</li>

<li>Guest faculty, in Electronics Science Department at Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra, (India), from 2004-2006.</li>

</ul>
</div></div>
<div class="data_field">
<h3>Education</h3>
<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>Post Doc. in Nano Science and Nanotechnology from DST Unit on Nanosciences at Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)-Kanpur from 2007-  2010.</li>

<li>Ph.D in VLSI Technology from Electronics Science Department,  Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra from 2002-2007.</li>  

<li>Master in Science in Physics, Electronics Science from department of Physics, Himachal Pradesh University, Shimla from 2000-2002.</li>
</div>
</div>

Box 12053, Research Triangle Park, NC-27709-2053 <b>"Non Chemically Amplified Resists for EUVL at the 10 nm Node and Beyond"  $ 351000.0  </b>,<b> 2012-2015 </b>.</li><br>

Sharma</b>, Amritha Rammohan and Ashutosh Sharma, Golden Jublilee   Symposium on fabrication at small scale and INDO-US conference on fabrionics, organized by IIT -Kanpur, U.P. India, 9-12 December,<b>2009</b>.</li><br>    
<li> Polyaniline 1D Nanostructures film formation by electrochemical deposition for Biomedical Applications,  Neelam Saurakhiya, <b>Satinder K. Sharma</b> and Ashutosh Sharma, at International Conference on Nano Science and Technology(ICONSAT)2010,   held at IIT Bombay, Mumbai, India, 17-20,February, <b>2010</b>.</li><br>
<li> Chalcogenide Glass Photoresists for Grayscale Patterning Prabhat K. Dwivedi,<b>Satinder K. Sharma</b>, Amritha Rammohan and Ashutosh Sharma at the 55th DAE Solid State  Physics Symposium <b>2010</b>, India.</li><br>
<li> Effects of Post-Deposition Annealing on the Material and Electrical Characteristics of  Sputtered Ultrathin HfO2 Film on Silicon, Vikram Singh,<b>Satinder K. Sharma</b>, R.K. Nahar , Dinesh Kumar; presented in 16th International Workshop on The Physics of Semi  Conductor Devices,<b>2011</b> at Indian Institute of Technology-Kanpur, India.</li><br>
<li> Radial hetrojunction formation of ZnO-Polyaniline coaxial nanowires via electrochemical  route, Neelam Saurakhiya , <b>Satinder Kumar Sharma</b>, Ashutosh Sharma, presented at International Conference on Nanoscience and Technology (ICONSAT - 2012)  January 20 to 23, <b>2012</b> at Hyderabad, India.</li><br>
<li> Ultrathin HfO2 based CMOS for space application, Vikram Singh,<b>Satinder K. Sharma</b>,R.K. Nahar , Dinesh Kumar; will be presented at International conference on nano materials and Nanotechnology,18-23 December, <b>2011</b>, at University of Delhi, India. </li><br> 
<li> Novel Non-Chemically Amplified (n-CARs) Resists for Next Generation Lithography (NGL) Applications, Vikram Singh, V. S. V. Satyanarayana, Vishwanath Kalyani,<b>Satinder K. Sharma</b>, Subrata Ghosh, Chullikkattil P. Pradeep and Kenneth E. Gonsalves, "presented, as a poster presentation at ICON-2014,Theme 06: Nanolithography / Microfluids:- Abstract No.:- 17 ; Poster ID:- P-12 (T-6)., on March 3-5, 2014 at Chandigarh, India.<b>(Received the best poster award sponsored by RSC)</b>.</li><br> 
<li> Novel non-Chemical Amplified (n-CARs) Negative Resists for EUVL, Vikram Singh, V. S. V. Satyanarayana,<b>Satinder K. Sharma</b>, Subrata Ghosh, Kenneth E. Gonsalves, presented, as a oral presentation at SPIE Advanced Lithography Symposium-2014, Advances in Patterning Materials and Processes XXXI, SPIE paper no, 9051-5,<b> 2014.</b></li><br>                      
<li> Organic-Inorganic Hybrid Resists for EUVL, Vikram Singh, Vishwanath Kalyani, V. S. V. Satynarayana, Pradeep Parameswaran, Subrata Ghosh,<b>Satinder K. Sharma</b>, Kenneth E. Gonsalves, presented, as a poster presentation at SPIE Advanced Lithography Symposium-2014, Advances in Patterning Materials and Processes XXXI, SPIE paper no, 9051-71,<b> 2014</b>.</li><br>
<li> Design and synthesis of novel resist materials for EUVL, presented, V. S. V. Satyanarayana, Vikram Singh, Subrata Ghosh,<b>Satinder Sharma</b>, Kenneth E. Gonsalves, "as a poster presentation at SPIE Advanced Lithography Symposium-2014, Extreme Ultaviolet (EUV) Lithography V, SPIE paper no, 9048-67, <b>2014</b>.</li><br>
<li> Optimization of processing parameters and metrology for novel NCA negative resist for NGL, Vikram Singh, V. S. V. Satyanarayana, Felipe Kessler, Francine R. Scheffer, Daniel E. Weibel,<b> Satinder K. Sharma </b>, Subrata Ghosh, Kenneth E. </li><li>A Catalytic Amount of Nickel (II) Chloride Hexahydrate and 1, 2- Ethanedithiol is a Good Combination for the Cleavage of Tetrahydropyranyl (THP) and tert-Butyldimethylsilyl (TBS) Ethers. </li><li>A Simple and Practical Synthetic Protocol for Acetalisation, Thioacetalisation and Transthioacetalisation of Carbonyl Compounds under Solvent-Free Conditions. Abu T. Khan, Ejabul Mondal, Subrata Ghosh, and Samimul Islam. Eur. J. Org. Chem. 2004, 2002-2009.

<h3>Areas of Interest</h3>

<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Almost Periodic Solutions</li>
<li>Functional Differential Equations</li>
<li>Ecological Modeling</li>
<li>Fractional Differential Equations</li>
</ul></div>
</div>

<div class="data_field">

<h3>Education</h3>
<div class="data"><ul>
<li>Ph.D. (2009) IIT Kanpur, India.</li>
<li>M.Sc. (2004) IIT Kanpur, India.</li>
</ul></div>

<div class="data_field">

<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Selected Publications</h3>
<div class="data" align="justify">

<ul>

<li><b> S Abbas</b>, VS Erturk, S Momani,
Dynamical analysis of the Irving–Mullineux oscillator equation of
fractional order,
<b>Signal Processing</b>, 102, 171-176, 2014.
</li>
<li>JP Tripathi, <b>S Abbas</b>, M Thakur, Local and global stability analysis of
a two prey one predator model with help,
<b>Communications in Nonlinear Science and Numerical Simulation</b>, 19 (9),
3284-3297, 2014.</li>
<li>M Banerjee, <b>S Abbas</b>, Existence and non-existence of spatial patterns in
a ratio-dependent predator–prey model, <b>accepted in Ecological Complexity</b>,
2014.</li>

<li><b>S Abbas</b>, L Mahto, M Hafayed, AM Alimi, Asymptotic almost automorphic
solutions of impulsive neural network with almost automorphic
coefficients, <b>accpeted in Neurocomputing</b>, 2014.

</li>
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b> Erturk, V. S., Momani, S., Dynamical analysis of the Irving–Mullineux oscillator equation of
 fractional order, <b>Signal Processing</b>, V.
102, 2014, 171-176.
</li>

</li>
<li>Tripathi,J.P., <b>Abbas, S.</b>, Thakur, M., Local and global stability analysis of a two prey one predator model
 with help, <b>Comm. Nonl. Sci. Num. Simu.</b>, V.
19 (9), 2014, 3284-3297.
</li>

<li>Hafayed, M., <b>Abbas, S.</b>. 
On Near-optimal Mean-field Stochastic Singular Controls: Necessary and Sufficient Conditions for Near-optimality, 
accepted, <b>Journal of Optimization theory and Applications</b>, DOI: 10.1007/s10957-013-0361-1, 2013.
</li>
</li>
<li>Mahto, L., <b>Abbas, S.</b>, Favini, A., Analysis of Caputo Impulsive Fractional
Order Differential Equations with Applications, <b>Int. J. Diff. Eqns.</b>, V.
2013 (2013), Article ID 704547, 11 pages.</li>

<li>Yonghui Xia, Xiang, G., Patricia, J. Y. Wong, <b>Abbas, S.</b>, Application of
Mawhin's coincidence degree and matrix spectral theory to a delayed system.
<b>Abstract and Applied Analysis</b>, vol. 2012, Article ID 940287, 19 pages, 2012.</li>

<li>
Hafayed, M., <b>Abbas, S.</b>, Veverka, P., On necessary and sufficient conditions for near-optimal singular 
stochastic controls, <b>Optimization Letters</b>, In press, 2012.</li>

<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Existence and Attractivity of k-Pseudo Almost Automorphic Sequence Solution of a Model of Bidirectional Neural Networks. <b>Acta Applicandae Mathematicae</b>, 119(1), 2012, 57-74.</li>
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Sen, M., Banerjee, M., Almost periodic solutions of non-autonomous model of phytoplankton allelopathy,  <b>Nonlinear Dynamics</b>, Volume 67, Number 1, 203-214, 2012. </li>

<li><b>Abbas, S.</b> Pseudo almost automorphic solutions of some nonlinear integro-differential equations. <b>Computers & Mathematics with Applications</b>, 62(05):2259-2272, 2011.</li>

<li><b>Abbas, S.</b> , Banerjee, M., Momani, S., Dynamical analysis of a fractional order modified logistic model, <b>Computers and Mathematics with Applications</b>, Volume 62, Issue 3 (2011), 1098-1104. </li>

<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, "Existence of solutions to fractional order ordinary and delay differential equations 
and applications", <b>Electronic Journal of Differential Equations</b>, Vol. 2011(2011), 9, pp. 1-11.</li>

<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, “Weighted pseudo almost automorphic sequences and their applications”, <b>Electronic Journal of Differential Equations</b>, Vol. 2010(2010), No. 121, pp. 1-14.</li>
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, “Pseudo almost automorphic solutions of fractional order neutral differential equation”, <b>Semigroup Forum</b>, Volume 81, Number 3, 393-404, 2010.</li>
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Banerjee, M., “Stochastically perturbed allelopathic phytoplankton model”, <b>Electronic Journal of Differential Equations</b>, Vol. 2010(2010), No. 98, pp. 1-15.</li>

<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Banerjee, M., Hungerbuhler, N., “Existence, uniqueness and stability analysis of allelopathic stimulatory phytoplankton models” <b>J. Math. Anal. Appl.</b>, Volume 367, Issue 1, 1, July 2010, 249-259.</li>

<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, “Pseudo almost periodicity and stability of solutions of discrete time cellular neural networks”, <b>Nonlinear Analysis: Modeling and Control</b>, 14, No. 3 (2009), 283-301.</li>
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Bahuguna, D. Banerjee, M., “Effect of stochastic perturbation on two species competitive model” <b>Nonlinear Analysis, HS</b>, 3, 3 (2009), 195-206.</li> 
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Bahuguna, D., “Existence of solutions to quasilinear functional differential equations”, 
<b>Electronic Journal of Differential Equation</b>,  Vol. 2009 (2009), No. 164, 1-8.</li> 

<li>Bahuguna, D., <b>Abbas, S.</b>, Dabbas, J., “Partial functional differential equation with an integral Condition and applications to population dynamics”, <b>Nonlinear Analysis, TMA</b>,  69 (2008), 2623-2635.</li>
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Bahuguna, D., “Almost periodic solutions of neutral functional differential equations”, <b>Computers and Mathematics with Application</b>, 55-11 (2008), 2593-2601.</li>
<li><b>Abbas, S.</b>, Bahuguna, D., “Almost periodic solutions of functional differential equations by monotone iterative method”, <b>Differential Equations and Dynamical Systems</b>, Vol. 16, Nos. 1 & 2, Jan.& Apr. 2008, 47-62.</li>

</div>

</div>

<div class="data_field large_df">

</li>

<div id="left_column">
<h2 class="page_heading">Dr. Sarita Azad</h2>
<div id="data_container">
<div id="data">
<div id="data_top"><img src="images/sarita.jpg" alt="Dr. Sarita Azad" />
<div id="contact_info">
<table>

<tr>
<th>Phone : </th>	<td>01905-237928</td></tr>
<tr><th>EMail : </th>	
<td>sarita[at]iitmandi[dot]ac[dot]in</td></tr>

<tr>
<th>Address : </th>	<td>School of Basic Science</td>

</tr>

<tr><th></th><td>IIT Mandi, PWD Rest House 2nd floor,</td></tr>

<tr><th></th><td>Near Bus Stand, Mandi - 175001</td></tr>

<tr><th></th><td>India</td></tr>

</tbody></table></div></div>
<div id="data_bottom">
<div class="data_field">
<h3>Research Interests</h3>
<div class="data" align="justify">

<ul><b>My major interests have been analysing real-time data from various interdisciplinary fields by employing a combination of techniques, ranging from time series analysis to deterministic and stochastic models, to pursue this aim.</b><br/><br/>


<li><b>Epidemics and Bio-Surveillance</b>: Mosquito-transmitted viral diseases like malaria are among the top infectious killing diseases in India and worldwide. I work on developing algorithms for modelling disease spread; understanding their temporal and spatial patterns; finding climate predictors; and developing social networks for surveillance purposes.</li>

<li><b>Indian Monsoon Rainfall</b>: The monsoon is a stochastic process. Area of interest is the analysis of rainfall data for developing effective prediction methods using time-frequency and probabilistic estimation methods. Also, I am statistically analysing the contemporaneous relationship between the intensity of the Indian monsoon and run-off in the major rivers of Himalayan Basin.</li>

<li><b>International affairs and Policy analysis</b>: The focus is on analysing social trends and international relations using mathematical (game theory) and statistical models. The techniques like social networks are used for finding community structures in social interactions and security related studies.</li></ul>
</div></div>
<div  class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Education</h3>
<div class="data">
<ul>
<li>Ph.D (2008) : Department of Applied Mathematics, Faculty of Technology, Delhi University, India, worked under the supervision of Prof. Roddam Narasimha, (FRS) at Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. </li>
<li>M.Sc (1999): Department of Mathematics, IIT Delhi, India.</li>
<li>B.Sc Hons. (1997) : Department of Mathematics, Delhi University (DU), New Delhi, India. </li>
</ul></div></div>
<div  class="data_field large_df">
<h3>Awards and Fellowships</h3>
<div class="data">
<ul>
<li> President's Award for Excellence -2011 at the Institute for Defence Studies and Analyses (IDSA), New Delhi.</li>

<li>Dr. D. C. Pavate Fellowship-2009 for visiting Department of Applied Mathematics and Theoretical Physics, University of Cambridge, UK. </li>

 </ul></div></div>
<div  class="data_field large_df">

Reviewer for Journal of Applied Statistics.</li>
  </ul></div></div>
</div>

<div class="data_field large_df">
<h3>International Peer Reviewed Publications</h3>
<div class="data">

<h4>Indian Monsoon Rainfall Analysis </h4>

<li>	Sarita Azad, and M. Rajeevan. Analyzing Predictability in Indian Monsoon: A Data Analytic Approach, Communicated. 2014</li>

<li>	Sarita Azad. Identification of Common Periodicities between Correlated Indian Rainfall Time Series,  Advanced Science Letters, 4 (1): 159–164, 2011.</li>
<li>Sarita Azad and Roddam Narasimha. Periodicities in Indian Monsoon Rainfall over Spectrally Homogeneous Regions, International J. Climatology, 30: 2289–2298, 2010</li>
<li>Sarita Azad and R. Srivastava. A Study of Logistic Map Using Wavelets, International Journal of Applied Mathematics and Statistics, 14 (J09): 60-68, 2009.</li> 
<li>Sarita Azad and Roddam Narasimha. A Wavelet Based Significance Test for Periodicities in Indian Monsoon Rainfall, International Journal of Wavelets, Multi-resolution and Information Processing, 6(2): 291–304, 2008.</li>
